description.ko: 보이지 않는 오디오 파형을 복잡한 건축적 조각으로 변환하여 소리의 주파수를 물리적으로 형상화한 작품입니다.
description.en: A physical manifestation of sound frequencies, transforming invisible audio waves into complex architectural sculptures.

prompt: A 3D cymatic visualization of a liquid sapphire #4169E1 sphere reacting to a high-frequency #FFD700 golden resonance. The liquid surface erupts into sharp architectural spikes and vibrating ripples in a dark obsidian void. Minimalist #FF4500 and #32CD32 light trails track the invisible soundwaves. High-speed motion blur, 8k, raytracing, visual consonance of sound.
